body: If this is hijacking I hope someone to hijack every single discussion that we have here. This looks great and I think we should add it to Honeybee official release. Here is a code snippet for extrude curve. You actually need to move the curve and loft them together. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1wKh57E-s8x-KZT7km0Cq-4-WRJUifLu*ZaaUmzM97A3Sk6FkMs8kR0xzzy-5n8MV8RQMc7s72KTijEtZmYBwvFgpcirYOQ0/extrudeCurve.png) Notice how I did it for every segment of the curve so the result will be a polysurface and not a single extruded surface! Looking forward for a PR after you have extrude curve added. Mostapha  PS: I'm [finally] checking the electrical light files tonight!
